title: Pattern Matching & Predicates
description: LIKE, BETWEEN, IN, EXISTS, ANY/ALL predicates

queries.title: LIKE Pattern Matching (Basic)
queries.description: Match products starting with "Ch" using % wildcard

queries.title: LIKE with Underscore Wildcard
queries.description: Match names like "John" using _ for single character

queries.title: BETWEEN for Ranges
queries.description: Find products with prices in the 10-50 range (inclusive)

queries.title: BETWEEN with Dates
queries.description: Filter employees hired between 2019-2021 using date functions

queries.title: IN with List
queries.description: Find products in specific categories using IN operator

queries.title: IN with Subquery
queries.description: Use IN with subquery to find products in Beverage categories

queries.title: EXISTS with Correlated Subquery
queries.description: Find categories that have expensive products (>$50)

queries.title: NOT IN and NOT BETWEEN
queries.description: Find products outside price range and excluded categories

queries.title: Combining Predicates
queries.description: Complex filtering using multiple predicates together

queries.title: ALL Quantified Comparison
queries.description: Find products more expensive than ALL category 1 products

queries.title: ANY/SOME Quantified Comparison
queries.description: Find products more expensive than ANY category average
